resources.string: ANYONE with the app will be able to decrypt your message!
Following contact can decrypt your message:
No receiver is selected. Anyone can decrypt your message.
You can share this encrypted message to %1$s.
Anyone can read the shared message.

\"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Most SNS apps will lossy compress your image, which may break the cipher message and cannot be decrypted. If you know what you are doing, continue; Otherwise, press \"Download\" and send the original image from your favorite SNS app.
Once removed, messages encrypted with this key cannot be read anymore.
You have not created any keys yet. Try adding a new one.
Please grant us camera permission in your system settings, so that we can scan QR Codes.
Try again scanning a valid QR Code generated by Cryptex
